name: Used Electric Vehicle Rebate
description: $4,000 rebate for pre-owned Battery Electric or Plug-in Hybrid Electric Vehicle from dealers or private parties; can combine with other incentives
fullDescription: PG&E offers a $4,000 rebate for income-qualified customers purchasing pre-owned electric vehicles, making EVs more affordable whether buying from dealers or private sellers.
whatTheyOffer:
- $4,000 rebate for used EV purchase
- Covers Battery Electric Vehicles (BEV)
- Covers Plug-in Hybrid Electric Vehicles (PHEV)
- Purchase from dealer or private party
- Can combine with federal tax credits
- Can combine with other state/local rebates
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a PG&E customer
2. Meet income eligibility (CARE/FERA or income-qualified)
3. Purchase or lease qualifying used EV
4. Apply within 180 days of purchase
5. Submit proof of purchase and registration
6. Receive rebate after approval
keywords: EV rebate, PG&E, used car, electric vehicle, $4000, plug-in hybrid, private party, dealer, clean transportation
